channel.title: Influencer on 无关紧要的宇宙
channel.description: Recent content in Influencer on 无关紧要的宇宙

item.title: Right-Wing Activists Are Targeting People for Allegedly Celebrating Charlie Kirk's Death
item.description: Extremists and an anonymously run website are posting identifying details about people accused of celebrating Charlie Kirk’s murder online. Some of those targeted are now getting death threats.

item.title: Right-Wing Activists Are Targeting People for Allegedly Celebrating Charlie Kirk's Death
item.description: Extremists and an anonymously run website are posting identifying details about people accused of celebrating Charlie Kirk’s murder online. Some of those targeted are now getting death threats.

item.title: Right-Wing Influencers Are Turning to Foreign Affairs
item.description: Conservative creators are increasingly focusing on foreign policy. Whether they’re emissaries from or to the US isn’t always entirely clear.

item.title: Right-Wing Influencers Are Turning to Foreign Affairs
item.description: Conservative creators are increasingly focusing on foreign policy. Whether they’re emissaries from or to the US isn’t always entirely clear.

item.title: Spiritual Influencers Say ‘Sentient’ AI Can Help You Solve Life’s Mysteries
item.description: As concerns grow about AI chatbots leading users into delusional spirals, prominent spiritual influencers are capitalizing on an emerging form of techno-spirituality.

item.title: Spiritual Influencers Say ‘Sentient’ AI Can Help You Solve Life’s Mysteries
item.description: As concerns grow about AI chatbots leading users into delusional spirals, prominent spiritual influencers are capitalizing on an emerging form of techno-spirituality.

item.title: A Dark Money Group Is Secretly Funding High-Profile Democratic Influencers
item.description: An initiative aimed at boosting Democrats online offers influencers up to $8,000 a month to push the party line. All they have to do is keep it secret—and agree to restrictions on their content.
